result.arabic_text: وَإِذَآ أَرَدۡنَآ أَن نُّهۡلِكَ قَرۡيَةً أَمَرۡنَا مُتۡرَفِيهَا فَفَسَقُواْ فِيهَا فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡهَا ٱلۡقَوۡلُ فَدَمَّرۡنَٰهَا تَدۡمِيرٗا
result.translation: 16.Nanu Magaalâ mara bayisnam fanna waqdi temqoo kee hatakat yan mara Yallih amri oggolaanaah kay farmoyta kataataanamah ken amrisna, tokkel tet (magaala kinnuk) mari Yallih amrik yawqeeh kay farmoyta dirabboysaah digaalâ maxco keenil nummattah, toysa nanu tet mara baysiyyah bayisna.
